game

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MovingEntity, StaticEntity

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines an entity that is drawn onto the world map and can interact with other entities
    Author:
    Will

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Entity(int xP, int yP, int radius)
      Construct an entity at position (xP,yP) with width and height equal to radius
      Entity(int xP, int yP, int width, int height)
      Construct an entity at position (xP,yP) with width and height

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        public Entity(int xP,
              int yP,
              int width,
              int height)
        Construct an entity at position (xP,yP) with width and height
        Parameters:
        xP - the x coordinate of the entity
        yP - the y coordinate of the entity
        width - The width of the entity, used to draw image
        height - The height of the entity, used to draw image

      • Entity

        public Entity(int xP,
              int yP,
              int radius)
        Construct an entity at position (xP,yP) with width and height equal to radius
        Parameters:
        xP - the x coordinate of the entity
        yP - the y coordinate of the entity
        radius - the radius of the Entity which translates into the width and the height

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer,
                 java.lang.String img)
        Draws an entity at (getX(), getY()) , getWidth() wide and getHeight() tall, rotated by getDir() radians about the center
        Parameters:
        drawer - the obejct used to draw the entity
        img - the String containing the image name to be used to draw the entity
